CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 38 Therefore , both IDT and NT are promising building blocks for D-A type low band gap polymers and the combination of the outstanding properties of IDT and NT may develop a series of promising donor materials for high performance PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| IDT (Indeno[1,2-b]thiophene) |
| NT (Naphthalenediimide) |
| D-A type low band gap polymers |
| donor materials |
| high performance PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells) |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |

| NT (Naphthalenediimide) |
| D-A type low band gap polymers |
